{{Description|You studied the ebb and flow of the tides with Paimon.}}
'''Rising Waters''' is [[Traveler (Hydro)]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The floating bubble hits once every '''0.5''' seconds.
* If the floating bubble capable of landing every hits, then:
** A total of '''8''' hits will be dealt to the enemy. (C0 - C1)
** A total of '''14''' hits will be dealt to the enemy. (C2 or higher)
* The floating bubble can trigger additional hits on a single target when hitting multiple entities such as [[Dendro Core]]s.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Trickling Purity}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Churning Whirlpool}}
